title: Big Bang Theory
description: A sitcom about a group of scientists and their social lives.

title: Friends
description: A story about six friends living in New York.

title: How I Met Your Mother
description: Ted Mosby recounts the story of how he met the mother of his children.

title: Stranger Things
description: A group of kids uncover supernatural mysteries in their town.

title: The Office
description: A mockumentary-style look at the day-to-day lives of office employees at Dunder Mifflin.

title: Game of Thrones
description: Noble families battle for control of the Iron Throne in a fantasy realm.

title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
description: A comedic look at a police precinct in Brooklyn.

title: The Simpsons
description: The satirical adventures of a dysfunctional American family.
